body_html:
--config=opt seems to be the problem you are running into.
Could you try the following command instead?
bazel build --copts="-mcpu=native" --config=cuda tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

In the meantime, I will mark this community support, because there is no official support for ppc64le for now.
cc @sandipmgiri in case I am missing anything.

body:
`--config=opt` seems to be the problem you are running into.
Could you try the following command instead?
`bazel build --copts="-mcpu=native" --config=cuda tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package`

In the meantime, I will mark this community support, because there is no official support for ppc64le for now.
cc @sandipmgiri in case I am missing anything.
